channel.title: Getting started on Open Operational Research

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is my first post on not-my-first blog. I’ll be honest, at this stage I’m seeing if I can compile the site and push it to the net. Expect changes coming soon. I’d put up a Construction in Process gif, but I’m told that Geocities has been down for some years now. Built with R: 3.5.1
